title: Noam Chomsky: World Politics and COVID-19/لقاء خاص مع نعوم تشومسكي حول السياسة العالمية وأزمة كورونا
description:
#noamchomsky 
#نعوم_تشومسكي
Noam Chomsky, one of the most influential public intellectuals in the world, discusses World Politics, COVID-19, the Ruler of the World, the new alliances, the super power countries and Russia which developed vaccine for covid-19.
tags: جامعة سيدي محمد ابن عبد الله
